headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Progen ITALI GTB
content: It takes a real visionary to look at the poise and balance of Progen’s Itali GTB and see any room for improvement. And whatever you think about his reliance on prescription opiates, no one can deny that Benny is just that - a visionary. In no time at all he’ll have this thing stripped down to its carbon fiber underwear, sporting a wildly oversized spoiler, and thundering round a track just as Mother Nature intended.
